author: Staff Reporter
text: Bhavishya Nidhi Adalat, ‘PF Near You’ programme, will be held at the office of the Regional Provident Fund Commissioner, at 66, Water Tank Road, Nagercoil, on March 10, according to a press release issued here. The adalat would be held between 10 a.m. and 1 p.m. for subscribers and between 3 p.m. and 4 p.m. for employers. EPFO members should submit their grievances to the Sub-Regional Office in person or forward them to P. Mohanan, Assistant Provident Commissioner (PGHS), by March 4.
title: EPFO adalat on March 10
